an5.81:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam appiyo ca hoti amanapo ca agaru ca abhavaniyo ca.
an5.81:1.3: Rajaniye rajjati, dussaniye dussati, mohaniye muyhati, kuppaniye kuppati, madaniye majjati—
an5.81:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam appiyo ca hoti amanapo ca agaru ca abhavaniyo ca.
an5.81:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca.
an5.81:2.3: Rajaniye na rajjati, dussaniye na dussati, mohaniye na muyhati, kuppaniye na kuppati, madaniye na majjati—
an5.81:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca”ti.
